title: When are we getting Recruit-A-Friend?
body:
It's been over a year since the Oceanic branch has been open, and It kind of sucks that there's no way for us to get the Medieval Twitch skin (unless we transfer to NA and recruit people there before switching back to OCE).

I asked this about 10 months ago but no one seemed to know, so I'll ask it again! When are we getting Recruit-A-Friend? Or if there are no plans to, when will you give us a way to get Medieval Twitch without server transferring?

replies.body:
We are working to bring the new RAF to OCE.
There are some tech / network works needed to be done in order to be able to launch.
Hopefully we will be able to launch at the same time as we re-launch RAF in other regions but it may take a bit longer if we are not able to finish the network works.
Stay tuned.

> We are working to bring the new RAF to OCE.
> There are some tech / network works needed to be done in order to be able to launch.
> Hopefully we will be able to launch at the same time as we re-launch RAF in other regions but it may take a bit longer if we are not able to finish the network works.
> Stay tuned.

When we do get it, will it remember any friends we already referred under the previous program?

> We are working to bring the new RAF to OCE.
> There are some tech / network works needed to be done in order to be able to launch.
> Hopefully we will be able to launch at the same time as we re-launch RAF in other regions but it may take a bit longer if we are not able to finish the network works.
> Stay tuned.

Thank you very much for the update! :)
When the new Recruit-A-Friend comes out, OCE will most likely get it. The same thing goes for Tribunal.
I had no idea they were remaking it again. Thanks!
Hopefully when it happens it will cause a flux of new players to start :)
